text: Laffon is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *André-Daniel Laffon de Ladebat (1746–1829), French financier, politician and philanthropist *Carmen Laffón (born 1934), Spanish figurative painter and sculptor *Jacques- Alexandre Laffon de Ladebat (1719–1797), French shipbuilder and slave trader *Jakob Amsler-Laffon (1823–1912), Swiss mathematicians, physicist and engineer *Yolande Laffon (1895–1992), French stage and film actress == See also == *Lafon (disambiguation) *Laffoon
title: Laffon
